text:
@SpeakerPelosi @AC360 Pelosi, if the Energy from Black lights instantly kill the  Covid19; I suggest Fauci try a test tube of healthy Covid19 with a few drops of Technetium tc-99m tetrofosmin.
A liquid injected into your blood stream which makes you RADIOACTIVE FOR A DAY OR TWO. It’s Nuclear Medicine.
